title: Only Love Can Break Your Heart

lastfm.summary: Written by Neil Young Produced by Saint Etienne Recorded Tuesday, January 30th 1990 Released May 1990 on Only Love Can Break Your Heart. Features on the debut album Foxbase Alpha. Notes Vocals by Moira Lambert of cult indie band Faith Over Reason. She now records as a solo artist under the name, Moira. The remix version found on the B-side of the original 12" strongly features a melodica played by Pete Astor (from The Loft and The Weather Prophets amongst others). This B-side version was the basis of Andrew Weatherall's acclaimed remix. Read more on Last.fm.
lastfm.title: Only Love Can Break Your Heart
